medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrence of symmetrical weakness proximally in the lower extremities.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced a sudden onset of persistent weakness in the bilateral proximal lower extremities at age 23, and current symptoms have recurred over the past month.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous episode of bilateral proximal lower extremity weakness diagnosed as Guillain-Barre syndrome at age 23, treated with high-dose glucocorticoid therapy.
